item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. WordPress.org's latest move involves taking control of a WP Engine plugin (28 points | discuss)
2. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (1187 points | 345 comments)
3. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (317 points | 106 comments)
4. Can logic programming be liberated from predicates and backtracking? [pdf] (76 points | 10 comments)
5. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (154 points | 105 comments)
6. Omni SenseVoice: High-Speed Speech Recognition with Words Timestamps (54 points | 15 comments)
7. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (127 points | 10 comments)
8. Lessons from Plain Text (17 points | 7 comments)
9. FLUX is fast and it's open source (131 points | 56 comments)
10. Heart rate variability differs between smartwatch and clinical testing (32 points | 16 comments)
11. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (65 points | 8 comments)
12. Washington's 'forgotten giant' volcano stirs (44 points | 17 comments)
13. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (500 points | 474 comments)
14. Turkish language has a gossip tense (177 points | 149 comments)
15. Writing an animated 3-star popup with .NET MAUI and Lottie (2022) (10 points | discuss)
16. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (742 points | 150 comments)
17. DuckStation (146 points | 52 comments)
18. The unreasonable effectiveness of plasmid sequencing as a service (4 points | discuss)
19. The 1/8th Sleep (103 points | 21 comments)
20. Hammer Looking for a Nail, AI Drone Looking for Business Case (15 points | 13 comments)
21. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (73 points | 31 comments)
22. Gödel Agent: A self-referential agent framework for recursive self-improvement (51 points | 19 comments)
23. The Explore vs. Exploit Dilemma (28 points | 4 comments)
24. Starship Flight 5 license issued by FAA (230 points | 192 comments)
25. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (478 points | 313 comments)
26. Tokyo looks to protect service staff from customers who are not so cool (22 points | 7 comments)
27. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (41 points | 17 comments)
28. Some Notes on Upgrading Hugo (25 points | 5 comments)
29. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (361 points | 53 comments)
30. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (133 points | 24 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
